thread.title: Pete O'Neill
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Pete O'Neill

author: Pete O'Neill
title: Pete O'Neill
text: The staff at Country Attire made placing my first order so easy and once I'd found the exact Barbour jacket I wanted they even matched the price with the lowest I'd found on the internet and no charge for postage either. You can also buy with total confidence and be assured that you are purchasing the genuine item. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to anyone.
